column2: Role & responsibilities   This is onsite job at Coimbatore location (no work from Home), please read below job description before applying.   1) Male (or)  Married women candidate - B.Com with MBA educational qualification preferred. 2) Salary will not be a constraint for good candidate. 3) Minimum 3 + years of experience required on below JD with team handling experience. 4) Verifying All Import related MIS reports timely manner. 5) Conducting all import related Meetings- weekly and Monthly. 6) Ensure to check All Import work done by timely manner 7) Monitor all the registers and compliance. 8) Verifying all the Purchase contract confirmation with approvals 9) Verify the sample check with all the documentation work and files and folders 10) Ensure check Import supplier payment is done within time 11) Ensure to check with supplier materials loading follow ups on time 12) Verifying the Pre-ETA checking and Materials Arrival report. 13) Verifying quantity claim and quality claim and claim follow-up. 14) Verifying Price calculation with actual and provisional  15) Ensure to check Import Licenses reports 16) Check whether customs duty has been paid on time  17) Ensure to check BE submission on time to bank 18) Verify the all bank charges like TT ,Bills,LC. 19) Check whether any detention charges / demurrage charges have been paid to the clearing and forwarding agents - ascertain the reasons for the payments of demurrage / detention charges. If detention charges due to unloading delay in factory mean coordinate with HODs  20) Ascertain whether demurrage / detention/terminal handling charges/free time allowed for the containers by the suppliers as per the terms of the purchase order to be borne by the suppliers have been recovered from the suppliers. 21) Ensure to check all import liner and CHA bills are done with the a/c department. 22) Ensure to check liner and Import party ledger balance verification. 23) Excel knowledge, Good with mathematical and analytical skills, Good English Communication Skills, Good leadership Skills are mandatory. 24) Preferred married female candidate in or nearby Coimbatore.   Preferred candidate profile   Married Women candidate with import experience. Perks and benefits   Depends on experience
